input_output_options.title: Global options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

input.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the samples in the experiment.
input.help_text: You will need to create a design file with information about the samples in your experiment before running the pipeline. Use this parameter to specify its location. It has to be a comma-separated file with 3 columns, and a header row. See [usage docs](https://nf-co.re/proteinfold/usage#samplesheet-input).
input.errorMessage: Input samplesheet must be a CSV file that exists. Please check the file path and format.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.
outdir.errorMessage: Output directory path must be specified

mode.description: Specifies the mode in which the pipeline will be run. mode can be any combination of ['alphafold2', 'alphafold3', 'colabfold', 'esmfold', 'rosettafold_all_atom', 'boltz', 'helixfold3'] separated by a comma (',') with no spaces.
mode.errorMessage: Mode must be a comma-separated list containing any combination of 'alphafold2', 'alphafold3', 'colabfold', 'esmfold', 'rosettafold_all_atom', 'boltz', or 'helixfold3' with no spaces.

split_fasta.description: Split input multi-fasta file in separated fasta files each of them containing one sequence to be folded

email.help_text: Set this parameter to your e-mail address to get a summary e-mail with details of the run sent to you when the workflow exits. If set in your user config file (`~/.nextflow/config`) then you don't need to specify this on the command line for every run.
email.errorMessage: Please provide a valid email address

multiqc_title.description: MultiQC report title. Printed as page header, used for filename if not otherwise specified.
multiqc_title.errorMessage: MultiQC title must be less than or equal to 100 characters

max_template_date.description: Maximum date of the PDB templates used by 'AlphaFold2' mode
max_template_date.errorMessage: Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format

alphafold2_db.description: Specifies the DB and PARAMS path used by 'AlphaFold2' mode
alphafold2_db.errorMessage: Please provide a valid path to AlphaFold2 database

full_dbs.description: If true uses the full version of the BFD database otherwise, otherwise it uses its reduced version, small bfd

alphafold2_mode.description: Specifies the mode in which Alphafold2 will be run

alphafold3_db.description: Specifies the DB and PARAMS path used by 'AlphaFold3' mode

alphafold3_mode.description: Specifies the mode in which Alphafold3 will be run

colabfold_db.description: Specifies the PARAMS and DB path used by 'colabfold'  mode
colabfold_db.errorMessage: Please provide a valid path to ColabFold database

colabfold_server.description: Specifies the MSA server used by Colabfold

num_recycles_colabfold.errorMessage: Number of recycles must be a whole number between 1 and 20

use_amber.description: Use Amber minimization to refine the predicted structures

db_load_mode.description: Specify the way that MMSeqs2 will load the required databases in memory
db_load_mode.errorMessage: DB load mode must be 0, 1, 2, or 3

host_url.description: Specify your custom MMSeqs2 API server url
host_url.errorMessage: Please provide a valid URL for the MMSeqs2 API server

create_colabfold_index.description: Create databases indexes when running colabfold_local mode

esmfold_db.description: Specifies the PARAMS path used by 'esmfold' mode
esmfold_db.errorMessage: Please provide a valid path to ESMFold database

num_recycles_esmfold.description: Specifies the number of recycles used by Esmfold
num_recycles_esmfold.errorMessage: Number of recycles must be a whole number between 1 and 20

esmfold_model_preset.description: Specifies whether is a 'monomer' or 'multimer' prediction

foldseek_search.description: Specifies the mode of foldseek search.

foldseek_db_path.description: Specifies the path to foldseek databases used by 'foldseek'.

foldseek_easysearch_arg.description: Specifies the arguments to be passed to foldseek easysearch command

process_skipping_options.title: Process skipping options
process_skipping_options.description: Options to skip various steps within the workflow.

institutional_config_options.title: Institutional config options
institutional_config_options.description: Parameters used to describe centralised config profiles. These should not be edited.
institutional_config_options.help_text: The centralised nf-core configuration profiles use a handful of pipeline parameters to describe themselves. This information is then printed to the Nextflow log when you run a pipeline. You should not need to change these values when you run a pipeline.

custom_config_version.description: Git commit id for Institutional configs.

custom_config_base.help_text: If you're running offline, Nextflow will not be able to fetch the institutional config files from the internet. If you don't need them, then this is not a problem. If you do need them, you should download the files from the repo and tell Nextflow where to find them with this parameter.

alphafold2_dbs_and_parameters_link_optio.title: Alphafold2 DBs and parameters links options
alphafold2_dbs_and_parameters_link_optio.description: Parameters used to provide the links to the DBs and parameters public resources to Alphafold2.

alphafold2_small_bfd_link.description: Link to a reduced version of the BFD dababase

alphafold2_pdb_mmcif_link.description: Link to the PDB mmCIF database

pdb_obsolete_link.description: Link to the PDB obsolete database

alphafold2_pdb_seqres_link.description: Link to the PDB SEQRES database

uniprot_sprot_link.description: Link to the SwissProt UniProt database

uniprot_trembl_link.description: Link to the TrEMBL UniProt database

alphafold2_dbs_and_parameters_paths_opti.title: Alphafold2 DBs and parameters paths options
alphafold2_dbs_and_parameters_paths_opti.description: Parameters used to provide the paths to the DBs and parameters for Alphafold2.

alphafold2_small_bfd_path.description: Path to a reduced version of the BFD database

alphafold2_pdb_mmcif_path.description: Path to the PDB mmCIF database

pdb_obsolete_path.description: Path to the PDB obsolete file

alphafold2_pdb_seqres_path.description: Path to the PDB SEQRES database

alphafold2_uniprot_path.description: Path to UniProt database containing the SwissProt and the TrEMBL databases

alphafold3_dbs_and_parameters_link_optio.title: Alphafold3 DBs and parameters links options
alphafold3_dbs_and_parameters_link_optio.description: Parameters used to provide the links to the DBs and parameters public resources to Alphafold3.

alphafold3_small_bfd_link.description: Link to a reduced version of the BFD dababase

alphafold3_pdb_mmcif_link.description: Link to the PDB mmCIF database

alphafold3_pdb_seqres_link.description: Link to the PDB SEQRES database

alphafold3_dbs_and_parameters_path_optio.title: Alphafold3 DBs and parameters links options
alphafold3_dbs_and_parameters_path_optio.description: Parameters used to provide the paths to the DBs and parameters for Alphafold2.

alphafold3_small_bfd_path.description: Path to the reduced version of the BFD database

alphafold3_pdb_mmcif_path.description: Path to the PDB mmCIF database

alphafold3_pdb_seqres_path.description: Path to the PDB SEQRES database

alphafold3_uniprot_path.description: Path to UniProt database containing the SwissProt and the TrEMBL databases

colabfold_dbs_and_parameters_link_option.title: Colabfold DBs and parameters links options
colabfold_dbs_and_parameters_link_option.description: Parameters used to provide the links to the DBs and parameters public resources to Colabfold.

colabfold_alphafold2_params_link.description: Link to the Alphafold2 parameters for Colabfold

colabfold_dbs_and_parameters_paths_optio.title: Colabfold DBs and parameters paths options
colabfold_dbs_and_parameters_paths_optio.description: Parameters used to provide the paths to the DBs and parameters public resources to Colabfold.

colabfold_alphafold2_params_path.description: Link to the Alphafold2 parameters for Colabfold

esmfold_parameters_link_options.title: Esmfold parameters links options
esmfold_parameters_link_options.description: Parameters used to provide the links to the parameters public resources to Esmfold.

esm2_t36_3B_UR50D.description: Link to the Esmfold t36-3B-UR50D model

esm2_t36_3B_UR50D_contact_regression.description: Link to the Esmfold t36-3B-UR50D-contact-regression model

esmfold_parameters_paths_options.title: Esmfold parameters paths options
esmfold_parameters_paths_options.description: Parameters used to provide the paths to the parameters public resources to Esmfold.

boltz_dbs_and_model_links_options.title: Boltz DBs and model links options
boltz_dbs_and_model_links_options.description: Links used to provide model links and weight links to Boltz

boltz_dbs_and_parameters_paths_options.title: Boltz DBs and model paths options
boltz_dbs_and_parameters_paths_options.description: Paths used to provide model paths and weight paths to Boltz

generic_options.title: Generic options
generic_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline, typically set in a config file.
generic_options.help_text:
These options are common to all nf-core pipelines and allow you to customise some of the core preferences for how the pipeline runs.

Typically these options would be set in a Nextflow config file loaded for all pipeline runs, such as `~/.nextflow/config`.

publish_dir_mode.description: Method used to save pipeline results to output directory.
publish_dir_mode.help_text: The Nextflow `publishDir` option specifies which intermediate files should be saved to the output directory. This option tells the pipeline what method should be used to move these files. See [Nextflow docs](https://www.nextflow.io/docs/latest/process.html#publishdir) for details.

email_on_fail.description: Email address for completion summary, only when pipeline fails.
email_on_fail.help_text: An email address to send a summary email to when the pipeline is completed - ONLY sent if the pipeline does not exit successfully.

plaintext_email.description: Send plain-text email instead of HTML.

max_multiqc_email_size.description: File size limit when attaching MultiQC reports to summary emails.
max_multiqc_email_size.errorMessage: File size must be specified with units (KB, MB, GB, TB)

monochrome_logs.description: Do not use coloured log outputs.

hook_url.description: Incoming hook URL for messaging service
hook_url.help_text: Incoming hook URL for messaging service. Currently, MS Teams and Slack are supported.
hook_url.errorMessage: Please provide a valid webhook URL

multiqc_config.description: Custom config file to supply to MultiQC.

multiqc_logo.description: Custom logo file to supply to MultiQC. File name must also be set in the MultiQC config file

multiqc_methods_description.description: Custom MultiQC yaml file containing HTML including a methods description.

validate_params.description: Boolean whether to validate parameters against the schema at runtime

pipelines_testdata_base_path.description: Base URL or local path to location of pipeline test dataset files

trace_report_suffix.description: Suffix to add to the trace report filename. Default is the date and time in the format yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss.

rosettafold_all_atom_dbs_and_parameters_.description: Parameters used to provide the paths to the DBs and parameters for RoseTTAFold All Atom.

rosettafold_all_atom_dbs_and_parameters_.description: Parameters used to provide the paths to the DBs and parameters for RoseTTAFold All Atom.

helixfold3_dbs_and_parameters_paths_opti.description: Parameters used to provide the paths to the DBs and parameters for HelixFold3.
